attributes.action: Restore free-to-air terrestrial TV coverage of live Test Cricket before the Ashes series in 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Test cricket on TV has become the sport of the affluent minority.  The loss of millions of viewers will inevitably result in a lessening of interest in the game at all levels.  Our whole culture is damaged by this loss, whether it be through reduced numbers of village cricket teams, or via the lively post match discussions at work or in the pub that everyone with an ordinary TV set can participate in.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Restore free-to-air terrestrial TV coverage of live Test Cricket before the Ashes series in 2009."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14138.asp

Prime Minister's Office
